Html: I just tried to install GalaSoft.MvvmLight.4.1.24.0.msi. Download is fine, and it seems to run and install stuff. However, nothing actually gets copied into the target folders. Just to check, I renamed the .msi to .cab and used 7-Zip to explode it and everything seems to be in order. Anyone else have this issue?
Okay, false alarm, perhaps. I tried it one more time, changing the target folder to something different than the default, and now it worked. So, nothing to follow up on.
